content:
ITEM NO.30               COURT NO.12               SECTION XI
               S U P R E M E  C O U R T  O F  I N D I A
                       RECORD OF PROCEEDINGS
SPECIAL LEAVE PETITION (CIVIL) Diary No(s). 24366/2025
[Arising out of impugned final judgment and order dated  16-10-2023
in FAFO No. 2967/2003 passed by the High Court of Judicature at 
Allahabad]
SHIV LAL GUPTA & ANR.                              Petitioner(s)
                                VERSUS
ORIENTAL INSURANCE COMPANY LTD. & ANR.             Respondent(s)
IA No. 147606/2025 - CONDONATION OF DELAY IN FILING
IA No. 147608/2025 - EXEMPTION FROM FILING O.T.
 
Date : 07-07-2025 This matter was called on for hearing today.
CORAM :  HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE PANKAJ MITHAL
         HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE K.V. VISWANATHAN
[PARTIAL COURT WORKING DAYS BENCH]
For Petitioner(s)  Mr. P. N. Mishra, Adv.
                   Mr. Umesh Dubey, AOR
                                      
For Respondent(s)  
          UPON hearing the counsel the Court made the following
                             O R D E R
1. Issue notice on the application seeking condonation of delay
as well as on the special leave petition, returnable within six
weeks. 
2. List this matter along with Special Leave Petition(Civil)
Diary No. 60271 of 2024. 
(VARSHA MENDIRATTA)                             (NIDHI MATHUR)
COURT MASTER (SH)                             COURT MASTER (NSH)
